actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Absentee Voting Act, the Soldiers' and Sailors' Civil Relief Act of 1940 to ensure that each vote cast by such voter is duly counted , and for other purposes.
short_title: Support to Absentee Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Voters Act of 2001

summary.text: Support to Absentee Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Voters Act of 2001 - Amends the Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Absentee Voting Act to prohibit: (1) a State from refusing to count a ballot submitted in an election for Federal office by an absent uniformed services member or overseas citizen voter because it was improperly or fraudulently cast, unless the State finds clear and convincing evidence of fraud in ballot preparation or casting; and (2) lack of identifying information from being considered clear and convincing evidence of fraud.
